itinerary.name: Belarus 4 Nights / 5 Days
itinerary.inclusions:
Accomodation in hotel 4 nights with BB					
Breakfast					
Transfer airport- hotel – airport					
Entrance fees and excursion: Minsk city tour, degustation at Komarovski market					
Belaz factory with firm souvenir, Mir Castle, Nesvizh Palace with animated performance					
Sula complex with animated excursion and drakara riding, traditional lunch with excursion at the farmstead,					
English-speaking guide per program 					
Transport services per program (2 pax – sedan (Mercedes), 4-6 pax – Mercedes Viano, 8-15 pax – Mercedes Sprinter)			
§  Folk show with dancing master class at the farmstead: 120 USD per the group			
§  Track riding 49 USD per pax
itinerary.exclusions:
Air Fare	
Travel Insurance 	
Visa	
Covid Test USD 75

itinerary.name: Egypt 4 Nights / 5 Days
itinerary.inclusions:
Accomodation in hotel 4 nights with BB	
Transfer airport- hotel – airport	
Full day visit to Giza pyramid and .	
Sphinx saqqara zoser pyramid area with english speaking guide	
Full day tour to visit the Citadel with Mohamed Ali Mosque	
Egyptian Museum and Khan El Khalil Bazaars 	
Drive to Alexandria by a private vehicle around	
03 hours per one way visit catacomb, Romanian theatre and Qaitbay citadel
itinerary.exclusions:
Internation and domestic tickets	
Travel Insurance 	
Visa to Egypt	
Entry of solar boat Museum = 10.00 USD per person	
Entry of Cheops Pyramid = 25.00 USD per person 	
The entrance of mummies room in the Egyptian Museum = 14.00 USD per person 	
All tipping for guide, drivers, representatives, restaurants, cruise 	
Covid test USD70/-

itinerary.name: Dubai  3 Nights / 4 Days
itinerary.inclusions:
3Nights /4 Days hotel stay with BB			
Return Airport Transport			
Half a day Dubai City Tour 			
Dhow Cruise Dinner			
Desert safari with BBQ Dinner			
Burj Khalifa at the Top			
Tourism fees 			
5% Vat			
All the taxes and service fees			
All tours & Transfers on Sharing/Private			
Driver cum tour Guide
itinerary.exclusions:
Air tickets			
Meal other than mentioned above			
Personal expenses like laundry , telephone etc			
Extra Tours if any			
UAE Visa with Travel Insurance			
Sanitization cost to Hotel if tested covid19 positive

days.title: day 2
days.description1:
Half Day Dubai City Tour
Burj Khalifa 124th Floor Non-Prime time
Dubai Mall + Musical Fountain Show + Laser Show on Burj khalifa

days.title: day 3
days.description1:
Morning Free
Red Dune Desert Safari + Live Entertainment + BBQ Dinner
